Name: Gravitas
Descriptions: It’s not the beauty of the building you should look at; it’s the construction of the foundations that will stand the test of time. So bring out the building skills in you and construct a bridge and prove your mettle as a civil engineer.
Rules: Online registration will be available for specific period
Can have a maximum of 2 members in a team
Top 4 teams will be selected to final round
Participants should not use mobile phones or any other references
Any malpractice will be add to disqualification
Event coordinators have the right to solve any disputes and their decision will be final
The final judgement is based on its aesthetic view and the load carrying capacity of the bridge which is examined by placing loads on it
All students with a valid identity card from their respective educational institution and a valid DYUKSHA ID are eligible to participate in the event
Decision of organizers will be ﬁnal and binding on all
The organizers have full rights to call off the event if the required number of entries are not met, if that is the case the registered participants will be informed at the earliest
Change in rules, if any will be highlighted on the website and notiﬁed to the registered teams
